replies.bodyText:
If so, wondering whether it makes sense to move this to FluxUtils?  something like:
Mono<String> FluxUtils.toBomAwarePublisher(
    Flux<ByteBuffer> stream,  
    String contentEncoding)
where contentEncoding is the value of Content-Encoding header, if no BOM prefix in-stream and if contentEncoding is null then method uses utf8 as default.

timeline.bodyText: Both JDK client and Netty client have to do the same logic for converting response byte array to string. It would be better to put this in Core utils somewhere to reduce duplication and if there are any fixes or updates to this logic, we don't need to update in two places.
